articles.title: Lionel Messi just one away from historic 800 career goals
articles.description: Messi has now scored 799 goals in his career with PSG, Barcelona, and the Argentina national team.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi is just one goal away from becoming only the second player ever after Cristiano Ronaldo to reach the 800-goal milestone.
The PSG star scored his 799 goal on Saturday against Nantes. On Thursday, he will have the chance to achieve the his... [1102 chars]

articles.title: Soccer-Messi's boyhood club Newell's Old Boys display banner in support after threats
articles.description: Lionel Messi's boyhood club Newell's Old Boys of Argentina put up a banner of support for their country's captain in their stadium on Saturday, following the attack against his wife Antonela Roccuzzo's family business.
articles.content: Lionel Messi's boyhood club Newell's Old Boys of Argentina put up a banner of support for their country's captain in their stadium on Saturday, following the attack against his wife Antonela Roccuzzo's family business. A threatening hand-written mess... [1284 chars]

articles.title: Sir Alex Ferguson chat with Man Utd star Lisandro Martinez detailed after World Cup win
articles.description: Lisandro Martinez helped Argentina to win the World Cup in December and he received a special congratulatory message from former Manchester United boss Sir Alex Ferguson
articles.content:
Sir Alex Ferguson spoke personally with Lisandro Martinez to congratulate him on winning the World Cup with Argentina, the Manchester United defender has confirmed.
Martinez was part of the Argentine squad which won the trophy in December, as the Sou... [2428 chars]

articles.title: UK says Falklands are British
articles.description: Britain has reasserted its sovereignty over the Falkland Islands after Argentina pulled out of a cooperation agreement and demanded new talks over the South Atlantic territory that sparked a 1982 war between the two countries.
articles.content:
Danica Kirka, The Associated Press

articles.description: LONDON (AP) — Britain has reasserted its sovereignty over the Falkland Islands after Argentina pulled out of a cooperation agreement and demanded new talks over the South Atlantic territory that sparked a 1982 war between the two countries.

articles.description: SANTIAGO, Chile (AP) — Home-crowd favorite Nicolas Jarry and Argentina’s Tomas Martin Etcheverry have advanced to the final of the Chile Open on Satur...
articles.content:
SANTIAGO, Chile (AP) — Home-crowd favorite Nicolas Jarry and Argentina’s Tomas Martin Etcheverry have advanced to the final of the Chile Open on Saturday.
